which-pm-runs

Detects what package manager executes the process

Installation

npm i which-pm-runs

Usage

'use strict'
const whichPMRuns = require('which-pm-runs')

whichPMRuns()
//> {name: "pnpm", version: "0.64.2"}

Related

  • which-pm - Detects what package manager was used for installation
